text: Peggy may refer to: == People == * Peggy (given name), people with the given name or nickname == Arts and entertainment == * Peggy (musical), a 1911 musical comedy by Stuart and Bovill * Peggy (album), a 1977 Peggy Lee album * Peggy (1916 film), a silent comedy * Peggy (1950 film), a comedy * Peggy (novel), a 1970 historical novel by Lois Duncan == Nautical vessels == * , a United States Navy patrol boat in commission from 1917 to 1918 * Peggy (1793 ship) * Peggy, a French ship in the 1801 United States Supreme Court case United States v. Schooner Peggy * Peggy of Castletown, an armed yacht built in 1789, the oldest surviving boat from the Isle of Man == Other uses == * Mitsubishi Ki-67, a Japanese Second World War heavy bomber given the Allied code name "Peggy" * Typhoon Peggy (1986) * Tropical Storm Peggy (1945) * Peggy, Texas, an unincorporated community * Peggy Creek, South Dakota * Peggy (Discover Card), an advertising character ==See also== * * * Peg (disambiguation), * Pegi (disambiguation) * Piggy (disambiguation),
title: Peggy
